languages.text: "Ты предан службе, а любовь потребует, чтобы ты был предан Вольному Торговцу. Тебя это просто разорвет".
"You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."
languages.original_text: "Ты предан службе, а любовь потребует, чтобы ты был предан Вольному Торговцу. Тебя это просто разорвет".

traits.locale_text: "You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."
"You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."
"You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."
"You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."
"You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."

languages.text: "Ihr seid Eurer Pflicht treu ergeben, aber die Liebe würde verlangen, dass Ihr {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben seid. Das würde Euch zerreißen."
languages.original_text: "You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid Eurer Pflicht treu ergeben, aber die Liebe würde verlangen, dass Ihr {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben seid. Das würde Euch zerreißen."

languages.text: « L'amour exige la loyauté, mais vous avez juré la vôtre à la Lex. Ce conflit vous serait insupportable. »
languages.original_text: "You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."

traits.locale_text: « L'amour exige la loyauté, mais vous avez juré la vôtre à la Lex. Ce conflit vous serait insupportable. »

languages.text: 「君は任務に忠実だ。だが、愛はローグトレーダーへの忠誠を求めるだろう。それが君を引き裂くことになる」
languages.original_text: "You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."

traits.locale_text: 「君は任務に忠実だ。だが、愛はローグトレーダーへの忠誠を求めるだろう。それが君を引き裂くことになる」

languages.text: «Es fiel a su deber, pero el amor le obligaría a ser fiel a su Comerciante Independiente. Eso le desgarraría por dentro».
languages.original_text: "You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."

traits.locale_text: «Es fiel a su deber, pero el amor le obligaría a ser fiel a su Comerciante Independiente. Eso le desgarraría por dentro».

languages.text: “你忠于你的职责，但爱情会要求你忠于行商浪人。这会让你夹在其中，无法两全。”
languages.original_text: "You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."

traits.locale_text: “你忠于你的职责，但爱情会要求你忠于行商浪人。这会让你夹在其中，无法两全。”

languages.text: "Çünkü sadakatin vazifene. Kalbinse seni Hür Tacir'e sadakate zorlayacak. İki arada bir derede kalacaksın."
languages.original_text: "You are loyal to your duty, but love will demand that you be loyal to the Rogue Trader. That will tear you apart."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü sadakatin görevine. Kalbinse seni Hür Tacir'e sadakate zorlayacak. İki arada bir derede kalacaksın."
